programme.desc: Andy finds himself the target of a lot of female attention as he prepares for the country club Christmas party, to which he had originally wanted to bring his girlfriend, Polly, until she announced she'd be going out of town for the holidays.

programme.title: For Me and My Gal
programme.desc: A vaudeville team with a song-and-dance act are tested by one constantly using the other to get ahead, before they are both put to the real test by the arrival of World War I.

programme.title: The Pirate
programme.desc: A 19th-century traveling song-and-dance man impersonates a pirate to impress a bored heiress who is about to enter an arranged marriage with a wealthy older man on a Caribbean island. Gene Kelly and Judy Garland teamed up for the second time in this 1948 musical (the first was 1942's "For Me and My Gal").

programme.title: In the Good Old Summertime
programme.desc: Two clerks in a turn-of-the-20th-century Chicago sheet-music store are intensely antagonistic toward each other, but unbeknownst to the two, they actually are getting very chummy as pen pals. A musical remake of "The Shop Around the Corner," in which the setting was changed from a Budapest sundries shop.

programme.title: The Harvey Girls
programme.desc: A group of refined waitresses for a chain of railroad-station restaurants in New Mexico are sent out to tame the wild and woolly West in the 19th century, but encounter some resistance in the form of a saloon owner, a corrupt judge and a local madam. Featuring the Oscar-winning song "On the Atcheson, Topeka and the Santa Fe.

programme.title: Girl Crazy
programme.desc: A teenage playboy is sent to a Western mining school by his father, where two ladies competing to be a rodeo queen vie for the young man's affection. One of the best of the Judy Garland-Mickey Rooney "Let's put on a show" musicals is driven by a George and Ira Gershwin score that features "Embraceable You," "But Not for Me" and "I Got Rhythm.

programme.title: A Star Is Born
programme.desc: An alcoholic matinee idol helps out an aspiring performer, who becomes a star; and while her career skyrockets, his declines.

programme.title: Judgment at Nuremberg
programme.desc: This Best Picture nominee is set in 1948 Nuremberg, Germany, where an aging American judge presides over the trials of Nazi defendants charged with war crimes against humanity. Maximilian Schell, as a defense attorney, won Best Actor, and Abby Mann was awarded the Best Adapted Screenplay Oscar. (cc).

programme.title: Captain Boycott
programme.desc: Ireland, 1880: peasants revolt against a land agent named Boycott---giving a new word to the language. Stewart Granger, Kathleen Ryan. Boycott: Cecil Parker. Dan: Noel Purcell. Father McKeogh: Alastair Sim. Watty: Mervyn Johns. Lively history. Directed by Frank Launder.

programme.title: Adam and Evelyne
programme.desc: Well-acted tale of a gambler (Stewart Granger) and his young ward (Jean Simmons). Bill: Edwin Styles. Moira: Helen Cherry. Roddy: Raymond Young. Molly: Joan Swinstead. Chris: Fred Johnson.

programme.title: Soldiers Three
programme.desc: Kiplingesque misadventures of three unruly British soldiers in 19th-century India.

programme.title: The Last Hunt
programme.desc: Tale of two buffalo hunters in the 1880s.

programme.title: All the Brothers Were Valiant
programme.desc: Nineteenth-century whaler (Robert Taylor) seeks his brother (Stewart Granger) in the South Seas. Priscilla: Ann Blyth. Silvia: Keenan Wynn. Native Girl: Betta St. John. Fetcher: James Whitmore. Holt: Lewis Stone. Quint: Kurt Kasznar. Colorful. Directed by Richard Thorpe.

programme.title: The Wild North
programme.desc: A driven, always-gets-his-man Mountie battles the harsh Canadian winter fraught with white-water rapids, avalanches and wolf packs in his efforts to bring in a trapper who killed a man in self-defense.

programme.title: Bhowani Junction
programme.desc: An Anglo-Indian woman, searching for a sense of identity and community amid the turmoil and upheaval at the time of the English withdrawal, falls in love with a British officer.

programme.title: The Prisoner of Zenda
programme.desc: The fourth remake of Anthony Hope's swashbuckling adventure stars Stewart Granger as both the prince of a Ruritanian country and his impersonator, a British citizen who winds up being crowned king after the real royal is poisoned and left in a coma. Lewis Stone, who plays the Cardinal, had the lead role in the 1922 silent version of the tale.(n)

programme.title: King Solomon's Mines
programme.desc: The wife of an adventurer hires an explorer to find her missing husband, who never came back from an expedition to find the legendary diamond mines of the Biblical ruler. A Best Picture nominee.(n)

programme.title: Scaramouche
programme.desc: In 18th-century France, a roguish ne'er-do-well masquerades as an actor in a plot to avenge the death of his friend who was killed during a duel with a master swordsman. The film is famous for one of the longest sword fights in cinema history. Lewis Stone costars as Georges de Valmorin and played villainous Marquis de la Tour d'Azyr in the 1923 silent version.(n)

programme.title: Moonfleet

Needless to say, things quickly spiral out of control as they deal with unruly guests while trying to keep their operation hidden from the police. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Held Up
programme.desc: An affable businessman (Jamie Foxx) gets stuck in the middle of a wacky hostage crisis inside a small-town convenience store. Rae: Nia Long. Pembry: Barry Corbin. Jack: John Cullum. Beaumont: Jake Busey. Rodrigo: Eduardo Yanez. Gloria: Julie Hagerty. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Passenger 57
programme.desc: The cohorts of a ruthless terrorist hijack a plane to rescue him from an FBI escort, but they do not know that a terrorism expert is aboard. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Ouija Origin of Evil
programme.desc: In 1967 Los Angeles, a widow making ends meet as a psychic is stunned when she finds a Ouija board that actually enables her to talk to the dead. While it's great for business, the board also allows a vengeful ghost to possess her 9-year-old daughter. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Transcendence
programme.desc: An AI expert's consciousness is transferred into a computer after he is killed by a radical antitechnology faction. As his awareness goes viral, he becomes an unstoppable force inhabiting every computer and electrical system on the planet. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: The Fugitive
programme.desc: A man who goes on the lam after he's wrongly convicted of killing his wife. As he scours the country looking for the true murderer, he is pursued be a relentless U.S. deputy marshal looking to bring him to justice. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: 5 Flights Up

programme.title: HBO First Look Three Billboards Outside Ebbing, Missouri

programme.title: Taxi

programme.title: Identity

programme.title: Murder on the Orient Express

programme.title: Glory Road

programme.title: Nine to Five

programme.title: The 9th Life of Louis Drax

programme.title: Dinner for Schmucks
programme.desc: Tim wants to snag a big promotion at work, but to do so he must take an eccentric nutcase to his boss's dinner party, where guests are supposed to bring the strangest person they can find. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: 17 Again
programme.desc: A former high-school basketball star gets a second shot at life after he's miraculously transformed back into a teenager. Back in high school, Mike O'Donnell was an MVP. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: In the Land of Women
programme.desc: A jilted L.A. screenwriter visits his sick grandmother in Michigan and gets involved with an attractive neighbor and her daughter. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Ghost Writer
programme.desc: A British screenwriter (Ewan McGregor) agrees to ghostwrite the memoirs of a retired prime minister, but after he takes the job the former political leader is accused of committing a war crime. Pierce Brosnan, Tom Wilkinson, Olivia Williams. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Client
programme.desc: An 11-year-old boy, who has witnessed a suicide, hires an attorney to protect himself and his family from mobsters. (cc).

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: Kyle closes in on finding Sidney, while Anderson meets a surprise potential ally; a prominent member of the community turns out to be an agent of the possessed, and few will escape his plan unscathed. (cc).

programme.desc: Two scientists race to avert a catastrophe when a series of climate-control satellites begin to malfunction. During their mission, they discover a conspiracy involving the satellites, which were designed to prevent natural disasters on Earth. (cc).

programme.desc: When a former Navy SEAL incurs the wrath of a dangerous gangster, he must mend fences with an old friend in order to escape death and protect his family. (cc).

programme.title: Unforgettable
programme.desc: In this female-centric thriller, a jilted ex-wife grows jealous of her former husband's new bride, and decides to destroy the latter's reputation in an attempt to get her old life back. (cc).

programme.desc: A Taiwanese special agent teams up with a Los Angeles jewel thief after the latter's daughter is kidnapped. (cc).

programme.title: Celebrity 100 Per Cent Hotter
programme.desc: Stylists Karen Williams, Daniel K Palmer and Melissa Sophia turn their aesthetic attentions to two celebrities whose distinctive images are not doing them any favours. programme.sub-title: Stand Up and Deliver: Kevin D

programme.title: Shock Docs
programme.sub-title: Body Freaks: Make Me a Perfect 10
programme.desc: Documentary following British people hooked on risky cosmetic procedures in the pursuit of body perfection. They include Sam who had Botox at 17 and spent £20,000 on his teeth, and Jacqui who makes a living by taking selfies. Cameras also focus on Ryan, who used Chinese foot-binding to shrink himself from a size 10 to a 6.5, and body-building twins Delroy and Trevor who compete over everything.

programme.title: Słoiki
programme.desc: Prawdzie historie ludzi, którzy przyjechali do Warszawy, by odmienić swoje życie. Mieszkańcy niewielkich miast i wsi liczą, że w stolicy uda im się zrealizować marzenia o lepszej pracy i pieniądzach. Nie łatwo jest im jednak odnaleźć się w wielkomiejskiej rzeczywistości.

programme.title: Eska On The Beach
programme.desc: Wakacyjny program Eski TV nadawany prosto z najpiękniejszych plaż. Ola Kot zaprezentuje widzom wiele ciekawostek, a wśród nich najnowsze plotki, porady modowe oraz wieści muzyczne z kraju i ze świata. Nie zabraknie najnowszych piosenek i teledysków. Widzowie przekonają się, który utwór zasłuży sobie na miano hitu lata.

programme.title: Eska Summer City news
programme.desc: Twórcy programu odwiedzają miejsca, w których odbywają się najciekawsze wakacyjne wydarzenia. Zawitają zarówno do największych polskich miast, jak i mniejszych ośrodków. Pojawią się na imprezach plenerowych, w klubach, na plażach, basenach, aquaparkach czy zawodach sportowych. Prowadzący zapytają napotkane tam osoby o to, jak spędzają lato i gdzie wypoczywają. Nie zabraknie rozmów z gwiazdami i gości specjalnych.

programme.title: Projekt Kamper
programme.desc: Filip Rudanacja zamienia swojego garbusa na atrakcyjnego kampera i wyrusza na wakacyjną wyprawę. Prowadzący oddaje się paradzie letnich wyzwań. Wypoczywa, szuka dobrej zabawy przy dźwiękach najlepszej muzyki i robi rzeczy, które każdy powinien wykonać podczas urlopu, jak zjedzenie gofra, czy rozstawienie parawanu.

programme.title: Eska Summer City news
programme.desc: Twórcy programu odwiedzają miejsca, w których odbywają się najciekawsze wakacyjne wydarzenia. Zawitają zarówno do największych polskich miast, jak i mniejszych ośrodków. Pojawią się na imprezach plenerowych, w klubach, na plażach, basenach, aquaparkach czy zawodach sportowych. Prowadzący zapytają napotkane tam osoby o to, jak spędzają lato i gdzie wypoczywają. Nie zabraknie rozmów z gwiazdami i gości specjalnych.

programme.desc: Competing today on the Remotely Funny hotline of dreams are Tyger in South Tyneside, Rocco in Middlesex and Amy in Birmingham. Beaming in wirelessly from India and running amok in their homes is Saara, who will be making mums and dads impersonate Bollywood dancing grannies and discover what you can make from dehydrated potato starch, squeezy cheese, Finnish gravy and yeast extract flavoured snack sticks! This is not an ordinary dish but this is no ordinary show and it's all done to win sweet samoji points in the quest to be crowned Remotely Funny champion.

programme.title: All Over the Place: Asia
programme.desc: Ed Petrie and his CBBC mates go on an adventure to find the most unusual and amazing places in Asia. And this time it's all the Main Events in one show! They take part in a belly button festival, a giant sandal race and wooden washtub challenge in Japan; ride in tuk-tuk taxis in Sri Lanka; give it pedalo power and take part in a game of Kabaddi in India; test their Kung Fu talents in China; and show off their blowpipe skills at a tribal village in Malaysia! Ed is joined on this bonkers road trip by Cel Spellman, Chris Johnson, Naomi Wilkinson, Ben Shires, Michelle Ackerley, Victoria Cook, Johny Pitts and Inel Tomlinson - there's stuff to do in Asia that is totally ace and it turns up All Over The Place.

Back in reality, Roy is inspired to generate a cartoon light-bulb to keep the dark at bay.
